products.name: Real Mayonnaise
products.facts: ["Real Mayonnaise is made with simple ingredients like egg yolks, vinegar, and oil.","The product is often packaged in recyclable glass or plastic containers, promoting eco-friendliness.","Real Mayonnaise contains no artificial preservatives, ensuring a natural quality.","It is typically made with non-GMO ingredients, aligning with sustainable agricultural practices."]

products.name: Wonder Bread
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Cereals and potatoes, Breads, White breads
products.facts: ["Wonder Bread is made primarily from enriched wheat flour, water, sugar, and yeast.","The packaging of Wonder Bread is designed to keep the bread fresh longer, reducing food waste.","Wonder Bread contains no artificial preservatives, focusing on simple ingredients for better quality.","The brand has made efforts to reduce its environmental impact by using recyclable materials in its packaging."]

products.name: Whole Grain Penne
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Cereals and potatoes, Cereals and their products, Pastas, Penne
products.facts: ["Whole grain penne is made from 100% whole wheat flour, providing more fiber and nutrients than regular pasta.","The production of whole grain penne typically involves less processing, which helps retain the natural nutrients of the wheat.","Whole grain penne is often packaged in recyclable materials, promoting eco-friendly practices.","Choosing whole grain penne supports sustainable agriculture, as it encourages the use of whole grains in diets."]

products.name: Extra Fancy Mixed Nuts
products.labels: Kosher,Unión Ortodoxa Kosher,en:Made in USA,en:May contain shell
products.facts: ["Made from a blend of high-quality nuts including almonds, cashews, pecans, and walnuts.","The nuts are sourced from sustainable farms that prioritize eco-friendly practices.","Packed in a resealable container to maintain freshness and reduce waste.","Contains no artificial preservatives or additives, ensuring a natural and healthy snack."]

products.name: Tomato Ketchup
products.categories: Condiments, Specific products, Products for specific diets, Products without gluten, Sauces, Tomato sauces, Ketchup, Tomato Ketchup
products.labels: No gluten, Kosher, Orthodox Union Kosher, Made in USA
products.facts: ["Tomato Ketchup is primarily made from tomatoes, vinegar, sugar, and various spices.","Many brands use sustainably sourced tomatoes to reduce environmental impact.","Ketchup packaging is often recyclable, promoting eco-friendly disposal practices.","Quality ketchup typically contains no artificial preservatives or high fructose corn syrup."]

products.name: Multi-Grain Crackers 6-Seed
products.labels: No gluten, Vegetarian, Vegan, No GMOs, Non GMO project
products.facts: ["Made with a blend of whole grains and seeds for added nutrition.","Contains no artificial preservatives or flavors, promoting a cleaner label.","Packaged in eco-friendly materials to reduce environmental impact.","Rich in fiber and protein, contributing to a balanced diet."]

products.name: Saucisson sec pur porc
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Fruits and vegetables based foods, Meats and their products, Meats, Prepared meats, Cured sausages, Dry sausages
products.facts: ["Made from 100% pork, ensuring high-quality meat content.","Produced using traditional methods that minimize environmental impact.","Free from artificial preservatives and additives, promoting natural quality.","Sourced from local farms that prioritize sustainable and ethical farming practices."]

products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Beverages, Hot beverages, Plant-based beverages, Herbal teas, en:unsweetened-beverages
products.facts: ["37.5 g is a lightweight material often used in eco-friendly products.","The production of 37.5 g materials typically involves sustainable practices to minimize environmental impact.","37.5 g materials are designed to be durable, ensuring long-lasting quality and reducing waste.","Many 37.5 g products are made from recycled or biodegradable materials, enhancing their ecological benefits."]

products.name: Echire, beurre de baratte d' excellence
products.facts: ["Made from high-quality, locally sourced milk from the Poitou-Charentes region of France.","Produced using traditional churning methods, enhancing flavor and texture.","Packaged in environmentally friendly materials to reduce ecological impact.","Recognized for its superior taste and creamy consistency, often used by gourmet chefs."]

products.name: Mayonnaise
products.facts: ["Mayonnaise is primarily made from egg yolks, oil, and vinegar or lemon juice.","Homemade mayonnaise can be more environmentally friendly as it reduces packaging waste compared to store-bought versions.","Quality mayonnaise should have a smooth texture and a balanced flavor, indicating fresh ingredients and proper emulsification.","Commercial mayonnaise often contains preservatives and stabilizers to extend shelf life, which can affect its quality and taste."]
